title: What is your place of calm?
body:
Since we only have misc and GD for discussion I decided to drop this post over with you guys. There are many things that we appreciate in life, that make everything else ok-ish. However there are some people a little lost in a limbo of love and can't find their peace of mind.

Give passer by's a hand and drop your peace of mind on this post, with some examples although as I would like them to see what you see in it :).

Mine is chill music, with a little bit of trip. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lki1y2wa820

Here we go!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
